title: Help Changing Server Languages!
body: I want to change my server language to Japanese but it wont let me. I tried to everything on the internet and changing the text files but all i get is  "you do not have permission to open this file." I followed online tutorials and i am the administrator of my computer (duh) i would just like some help changing the language!

replies.body: Each region has their own set of supported languages, per our [language ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751594-Changing-Game-Language)guide.  NA currently only supports English, so it wouldn't be possible to switch to another.  Because it's not something we support, I wouldn't be able to offer support and can't recommend modifying your game files.  Your permission issue, though, may be to restrictive security settings set by your OS.  Sorry!
